fullText: This is a world in which more is more, and then some, and the impulse is to shield your eyes from the exuberant vulgarity of it all. But wait — let the gaudy spectacle wash over you, and you may find, to your surprise, that you're actually enjoying yourself.

The score reflects the qualified recommendation.

showScoreExcerpt: "This latest musical adapted from one of Disney’s popular movies defied my dour expectations...“Aladdin” has an infectious and only mildly syrupy spirit. Not to mention enough baubles, bangles and beading to keep a whole season of “RuPaul’s Drag Race” contestants in runway attire."
